courses.title: Intro to Computer Science & Lab
courses.description: Basic concepts and theories in Computer Science.

courses.title: Intro to Programming & Lab I/II
courses.description: Basic concepts in C, C++, and Object-Oriented Programming. Laboratory exercises in C and C++.

courses.title: Digital Logic & Lab
courses.description: Basic concepts in Digital Logic Design and Computer Organization. Laboratory exercises in VHDL and Verilog.

courses.title: Programming and Intro Data Structures
courses.description: Computer science fundamentals, with programming in C++. Build an image processing program, a game of Euchre, a web backend, and a machine learning algorithm.

courses.title: Computational Linear Algebra
courses.description: Explored how mathematics and computation are unified for reasoning about data and making discoveries about the world.

courses.title: Intro to Computer Organization
courses.description: Saw how a low-level language is executed by the hardware, and how to put together basic hardware building blocks to create a working processor.

courses.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
courses.description: Data Structures and Algorithms in C++.

courses.title: Introduction to Artifical Intelligence
courses.description: Introduction to the core concepts of artificial intelligence, including intelligent search, game playing, logic, and constraint satisfaction.

courses.title: Foundations of Computer Science
courses.description: This course covered computer science theory and algorithms, including divide-and-conquer, dynamic programming, and graph algorithms.
